name: RESULT_VARIANT
description: RESULT_VARIANT is the primary table for storing variant result data.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: A list of variant records associated with this result

columns.name: VARIANT_RPT_YN
columns.description: This item tracks if the corresponding variant record will be sent to the patient's chart.
